overview: Conductor: Claudio Abbado. Orchestra/Ensemble: Berlin Philharmonic Orchestra.  1.Symphony no 1 in C major, Op. 21  2. Symphony no 2 in D major, Op. 36  3. Symphony no 3 in E flat major, Op. 55 "Eroica"  4. Symphony no 4 in B flat major, Op. 60  5. Symphony no 5 in C minor, Op. 67  6. Symphony no 6 in F major, Op. 68 "Pastoral"  7. Symphony no 7 in A major, Op. 92  8. Symphony no 8 in F major, Op. 93  9. Symphony no 9 in D minor, Op. 125 "Choral"
title: Beethoven: The Symphonies
